core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Chien indicates progress and success. The superior man, being humble as it implies, will have a good issue to his undertakings.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Modesty is power. Humility removes resistance, keeps things smooth, and leads to good outcomes because you're not triggering ego clashes.

translations.text: The first line, divided, shows us the superior man who adds humility to humility. Even the great stream may be crossed with this, and there will be good fortune.
初六：謙謙君子，用涉大川，吉。

lines.normalized_meaning: Double humility = safe passage. Because you're genuinely modest, even big, risky moves are blessed.

translations.text: The second line, divided, shows us humility that has made itself recognized. With firm correctness there will be good fortune.

lines.normalized_meaning: Your humility is visible and known. Stay steady and correct in that, and it brings good fortune.

translations.text: The third line, undivided, shows the superior man of acknowledged merit. He will maintain his success to the end, and have good fortune.

lines.normalized_meaning: You’re already respected. Keep carrying yourself well and you hold that success all the way through.

translations.text: The fourth line, divided, shows one, whose action would be in every way advantageous, stirring up the more his humility.

lines.normalized_meaning: Act, help, lead — and amplify humility while you move. That combo benefits everyone.

translations.text: The fifth line, divided, shows one who, without being rich, is able to employ his neighbors. He may advantageously use the force of arms. All his movements will be advantageous.
六五：不富以其鄰，利用侵伐，無不利。

lines.normalized_meaning: You don't have personal wealth, but people still rally to you — even for forceful action. Legitimate authority doesn’t require luxury.

translations.text: The sixth line, divided, shows us humility that has made itself recognized. The subject of it will with advantage put his hosts in motion; but he will only punish his own towns and State.
上六：鳴謙，利用行師，征邑國。

lines.normalized_meaning: Now humility is publicly acknowledged and can direct force. Use that power to correct your own domain — not to conquer everywhere.
